snippet: Domestic concerns, not international swaggering, dominated the choreographed call-in show, amid a second, punishing year of recession in Russia.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin's live annual call-in show forgoes provocation of foreign rivals in favor of emphasizing concerns of average citizens; leader is modestly optimistic about improving country's tumbling economy and fraying infrastructure while answering dozens of questions selected from millions submitted.
lead_paragraph: Domestic concerns, not international swaggering, dominated the choreographed call-in show, amid a second, punishing year of recession in Russia.

headline.main: Vladimir Putin’s Vulnerable Side Is at Fore in Call-In Show
headline.print_headline: Vulnerabilities at Fore in Putin’s Call-In Show
